document_data.name: Dillsandra
document_data.mainbody: '''Dillsandra''' was a young girl living in [[Easthaven]] during the 11th century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The dark haired girl liked to wear grey dresses.
document_data.Personality: Dillsandra was an inquisitive young lady who was interested in the adventuring garb of strangers.
document_data.Activities: Like many kids in the small community, Dillsandra enjoyed learning about the wild creatures of the [[Frozenfar]].
document_data.Relationships: Dillsandra was friends with a few other local children, like [[Jeffy]], [[Chizelo]], and [[Ahmadora]].
document_data.History: In [[Eleint]], [[1281 DR]], Dillsandra and a few other children met a group of mercenaries who decided to head with [[Hrothgar]] on his expedition to [[Kuldahar]].
